# doClick(_:)

**Instance Method**

Responds to (single) mouse clicks in a column of the browser.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func doClick(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Related Documentation

- **sendAction()**: Sends the action message to the target.

## Handling Mouse-Click Events

- **doDoubleClick(_:)**: Responds to double clicks in a column of the browser.
- **clickedColumn**: The column number of the cell that the user clicked to display a context menu.
- **clickedRow**: The row number of the cell that the user clicked to display a context menu.
